title: Bought rp not showing up but it is from my bankaccount.
body:
bought 35â‚¬ rp but i got an error ,
i check my bankaccount and its paid.
i try relogging but still have 16rp.
pls help out
{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Sometimes there can be a slight delay in RP getting added to your account. Try *attempting* a purchase of *anything* (even something that costs 1 IP). This may cause a manual sync of your currency with the server.

I hope this worked!
